long_description: The lightweight Gerber Gorge folding shovel lets you chop, dig, scoop, scrape and hammer your way through your next outdoor adventure. Carbon steel blade is lightweight and strong to handle the rigors of backcountry camping. Heavy-duty handle doubles as a hammer for pounding in tent stakes; rubberized grip creates a comfortable hold. Push-button mechanism locks the blade in place; blade folds closed for convenient packing. Includes a nylon storage bag.
short_description: The lightweight Gerber Gorge folding shovel lets you chop, dig, scoop, scrape and hammer your way through your next outdoor adventure.
